languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс с каменным выражением смотрит на экраны когитатора.{/n} "Да... пускай машина закончит свои исчисления. Я {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}хочу знать{/d}, что именно жаждали узреть в будущем прихвостни культа. Быть может... если увеличить мощность... она закончит работу быстрее..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс с каменным выражением смотрит на экраны когитатора.{/n} "Да... пускай машина закончит свои исчисления. Я хочу знать, что именно хотели увидеть в будущем прихвостни Культа. Быть может... если увеличить мощность... она закончит свою работу быстрее..."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix stares stonily at the cogitator screen.{/n} "Yes... Let's allow the machine to finish its calculations. I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}wish to know{/d} what precisely the cult's minions were so desperate to see in the future. Perhaps... if we were to increase the power... it would be finished sooner..."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс с каменным выражением смотрит на экраны когитатора.{/n} "Да... пускай машина закончит свои исчисления. Я {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}хочу знать{/d}, что именно жаждали узреть в будущем прихвостни культа. Быть может... если увеличить мощность... она закончит работу быстрее..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix stared stonily at the cogitator screen.{/n} "Yes... Let's allow the machine to finish its calculations. I wish to know what precisely the Cult's minions were so desperate to see in the future. Perhaps... if we were to increase the power... it would be finished sooner..."

{n}Heinrix stared stonily at the cogitator screen.{/n} "Yes... Let's allow the machine to finish its calculations. I wish to know what precisely the Cult's minions were so desperate to see in the future. Perhaps... if we were to increase the power... it would be finished sooner..."

languages.text: {n}海因里希呆呆地盯着沉思者的屏幕。{/n}“是啊……还是让这台机器完成计算吧，我{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}想弄清楚{/d}邪教的爪牙究竟急于看到怎样的未来。如果……我们加大功率的话……就可以更快完成计算……”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares stonily at the cogitator screen.{/n} "Yes... Let's allow the machine to finish its calculations. I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}wish to know{/d} what precisely the cult's minions were so desperate to see in the future. Perhaps... if we were to increase the power... it would be finished sooner..."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希呆呆地盯着思考器的屏幕。{/n}“是啊……还是让这台机器完成计算吧，我想弄清楚邪教的爪牙究竟急于看到怎样的未来。如果……我们加大功率的话……就可以更快完成计算……”
{n}海因里希呆呆地盯着沉思者的屏幕。{/n}“是啊……还是让这台机器完成计算吧，我{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}想弄清楚{/d}邪教的爪牙究竟急于看到怎样的未来。如果……我们加大功率的话……就可以更快完成计算……”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix observa impasible la pantalla del cogitador.{/n} «Sí... Dejemos que la máquina termine sus cálculos. {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}Quiero saber{/d} qué es lo que los esbirros del Culto estaban tan ansiosos por encontrar en el futuro. Tal vez... si aumentáramos la potencia... terminaría antes...».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares stonily at the cogitator screen.{/n} "Yes... Let's allow the machine to finish its calculations. I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}wish to know{/d} what precisely the cult's minions were so desperate to see in the future. Perhaps... if we were to increase the power... it would be finished sooner..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix observa impasible la pantalla del cogitador.{/n} «Sí... Dejemos que la máquina termine sus cálculos. Quiero saber qué es lo que los esbirros del Culto estaban tan ansiosos por encontrar en el futuro. Tal vez... si aumentáramos la potencia... terminaría antes...».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは考算機の画面をじっと見つめた。{/n}「そうですね…機械が計算を終えるのを待ちましょう。教団の手下たちが未来に何を見ることを切望していたのか、{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}正確に知りたい{/d}のです。おそらく…電力をさらに供給すれば…もっと早く終わるはずです…」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares stonily at the cogitator screen.{/n} "Yes... Let's allow the machine to finish its calculations. I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}wish to know{/d} what precisely the cult's minions were so desperate to see in the future. Perhaps... if we were to increase the power... it would be finished sooner..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは考算機の画面をじっと見つめた。{/n}「そうですね…機械が計算を終えるのを待ちましょう。教団の手下たちが未来に何を見ることを切望していたのか、{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}正確に知りたい{/d}のです。おそらく…電力をさらに供給すれば…もっと早く終わるはずです…」
{n}ハインリックスは考算機の画面をじっと見つめた。{/n}「そうだな…機械が計算を終えるのを待とう。魔女団の手下たちが未来に何を見ることを切望していたのか、{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}正確に知りたい{/d}。おそらく…電力をさらに供給すれば…もっと早く終わるはずだ…」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix starrt wie versteinert auf den Cogitator-Bildschirm.{/n} "Ja ... Gestatten wir der Maschine, ihre Berechnungen abzuschließen. Ich {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}wüsste gerne{/d}, was genau die Lakaien des Kults so verzweifelt in der Zukunft sehen wollten. Vielleicht ... wenn wir mehr Energie zuführen ... ist es früher vorbei ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares stonily at the cogitator screen.{/n} "Yes... Let's allow the machine to finish its calculations. I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}wish to know{/d} what precisely the cult's minions were so desperate to see in the future. Perhaps... if we were to increase the power... it would be finished sooner..."

Ich wüsste gerne, was genau die Lakaien des Kults so verzweifelt in der Zukunft sehen wollten. Vielleicht ... wenn wir mehr Energie zuführen ... ist es früher vorbei ..."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix fixe l'écran du cogitateur d'un regard froid.{/n} « Oui... Laissons la machine terminer ses calculs. {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}J'aimerais savoir{/d} ce que les sbires du Culte cherchaient si désespérément à voir dans l'avenir. Peut-être que... si nous lui fournissons davantage d'énergie... elle achèvera son travail plus vite... »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares stonily at the cogitator screen.{/n} "Yes... Let's allow the machine to finish its calculations. I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}wish to know{/d} what precisely the cult's minions were so desperate to see in the future. Perhaps... if we were to increase the power... it would be finished sooner..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix fixe l'écran du cogitateur d'un regard froid.{/n} « Oui... Laissons la machine terminer ses calculs. J'aimerais savoir ce que les sbires du Culte cherchaient si désespérément à voir dans l'avenir. Peut-être que... si nous lui fournissons davantage d'énergie... elle achèvera son travail plus vite... »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, kavramsayarın ekranına dalgınca bakıyor.{/n} "Evet... Makinenin hesaplamalarını bitirmesine müsaade edelim. Tarikat müritlerinin gelecekte bu denli görmek istedikleri neymiş, {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}bakalım{/d}. Şimdi... Gücü artırırsak... Daha erken bitebilir..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares stonily at the cogitator screen.{/n} "Yes... Let's allow the machine to finish its calculations. I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}wish to know{/d} what precisely the cult's minions were so desperate to see in the future. Perhaps... if we were to increase the power... it would be finished sooner..."
